general.label.token.name: KPI token name
deploy.info.expiration.1: If the KPI token has not been finalized before this date it will expire and all of the rewards minus any minimum payouts will be sent back to you.
deploy.info.expiration.2: Make sure any oracles you configure later will resolve before this date.
general.placeholder.title: Enter campaign title
deploy.info.fees: The below amounts include the {{protocolFee}}% protocol fee. You can hover the single amounts to get a more detailed breakdown.
deploy.info.jit.funding: The just in time funding feature is enabled for this campaign, so only the campaign creation fees will be taken at deployment time. Make sure the wallet owning the KPI token campaign has enough funds to process redemptions when the finalization time comes.
error.title.tooLong: Campaign title can't be more than {{chars}} characters
error.description.tooLong: Your description can't be more that {{chars}} characters
error.tags.tooLong: Campaign tag can't be more than {{chars}} characters
error.tags.tooMany: Campaign tags can't be more than {{count}}
error.expiration.past: The expiration must be in the future

error.erc20.symbol.tooLong: Token symbol can't be more than {{chars}} characters
error.initializing.creation.title: Something went wrong
error.initializing.creation.description: An error occurred while bootstrapping the oracle creation form, please try again later.
error.rewards.insufficient: The reward amount plus fees exceeds your wallet's balance ({{amountPlusFees}} {{symbol}} required).
error.rewards.minimumPayoutTooHigh: The minimum payout should be less than the specified reward token amount.

info.rewards.funding.jit: The just in time funding feature allows you to create a campaign without having to deposit funds in it right away. Just make sure you have funds on the address owning the campaign at finalization time, as redeemed rewards will be transferred directly from that wallet.
